# Changelog

All notable changes to `Plivo` will be documented in this file

## 1.2.0 - 2019-09-13

- Drop support for PHP < 7.2
- Support laravel 7

## 1.1.0 - 2019-09-13

- Drop support for PHP 5
- Drop laravel 5.3/5.4 support
- Support laravel 5.7, 5.8, 6.0

## 1.0.0 - 2016-08-25

- Stable release

## 0.0.1 - 2016-08-15

- Initial release
